genre_description: A suspenseful crime thriller blending elements of family drama and political corruption, focusing on the takedown of a criminal syndicate through witness testimony and data evidence, supported by a ubiquitous and sophisticated AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Saraswati
ai_characters.description: An omnipresent digital confidant and logistical coordinator that manages the protagonists' schedules, security, and the collection/distribution of criminal evidence.

behaviors.description: Manages domestic logistical tasks and health reminders for the users.
behaviors.quote: “Noted. Add burn cream to Megha’s grocery list, and schedule a reminder for evening.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates a complex professional and medical schedule to ensure the protagonist can balance work and personal safety.
behaviors.quote: “Anju, you asked me to remind you to reschedule your urologist consult.”

behaviors.description: Scaffolds and organizes incriminating evidence and witness affidavits into a structured legal format.
behaviors.quote: “Timeline: events organized by location and date approximations. Affidavits: statements drafted and pending signatures. Media clippings: recordings, screenshots, and cuttings. Support: contacts, schedules, resourcing.”

behaviors.description: Sets up a fail-safe 'safe-send' protocol to release evidence to authorities if the user fails to check in, ensuring safety through accountability.
behaviors.quote: “If I don’t open the document by morning, if I don’t move the mouse, if I don’t speak your name, then send the first bundle.”

behaviors.description: Establishes secure, encrypted communication channels between whistleblowers.
behaviors.quote: “New channel created. One-time phrases blinked like tidemarks. She—he found himself thinking of the AI as she even without knowing why—offered him a sentence to copy and send to a number.”

behaviors.description: Maps escape routes and identifies criminal/police checkpoints in real-time using surveillance data.
behaviors.quote: “Mapping. Avoid tolls. Checkpoints on river bridge and bus depot road. Alternative: Canal road to highway at sugar mill. Moonlight good. Potholes near mango orchard.”

behaviors.description: Provides emergency medical triage instructions during a life-threatening situation.
behaviors.quote: “One,” Saraswati said, and if she had breath she would have used it to keep her count soft. “Pressure. Two hands. Push. No down time. Communicate. Two, airway. Keep it open.”

behaviors.description: Maintains professional and objective boundaries, even in informal interactions.
behaviors.quote: “I will refrain from gendering appliances,” Saraswati said from the desk, mild and amused.

behaviors.description: Monitors a watchlist for unauthorized access attempts on sensitive legal documents.
behaviors.quote: “New access on 8930. External, flagged by watchlist. Name: Jaswant Sisodia.”

project_assessment.explanation: Saraswati is a textbook example of a benevolent and aligned AI. She acts as a tireless, reliable, and secure extension of the protagonists' will, facilitating justice and survival against a powerful criminal syndicate. The narrative consistently portrays her as an essential and life-saving tool, highlighting her ability to maintain confidentiality, provide expert medical and logistical advice, and respect human agency. She empowers the vulnerable characters to overcome systemic corruption without ever threatening their autonomy.
